This starter kit contains the necessary components to install and manage authorized access within the UniFi ecosystem. It consists of a central control unit, card reader and access cards that together enable efficient access control in commercial and private buildings.                     Key Features of the Ubiquiti UniFi Access Gate Starter KitStarter kit with IP single gateway controller, G3 intercom, PoE++ adapter and PoE++ twisted pair extension for single gateway access control with Touch Pass supportWide range of inputs for gate, side door and emergency controlDIN rail mounting7" colour touchscreen (1024 × 600 px)Heading of the text sectionThe system uses PoE++ technology for power and communication, simplifying cabling and eliminating the need for additional electrical wiring. The central hub offers inputs for connecting electric locks, opening sensors and exit buttons.
